name: market for ultraviolet lamp | ultraviolet lamp | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11359/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'ultraviolet lamp', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is a mobile infrastructure, representing the product of a ultraviolet lamp, used for water treatment. The weight measurements of the lamp parts are from an ultraviolet lamp autopsy. The process includes input material for the manufacturing but it excludes energy and water consumption during the production.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'ultraviolet lamp',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  ultraviolet lamp', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
